price: Na wakati tulipo waleta kundi la majini kuja kwako kusikiliza Qur'ani. Basi walipo ihudhuria walisema: Sikilizeni! Na ilipo kwisha somwa, walirudi kwa kaumu yao kwenda kuwaonya.
arabic: وَإِذۡ صَرَفۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ نَفَرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ فَلَمَّا حَضَرُوهُ قَالُوٓاْ أَنصِتُواْۖ فَلَمَّا قُضِيَ وَلَّوۡاْ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِم مُّنذِرِينَ
footnotes: Ewe Muhammad! Taja tulipo kuletea kikundi cha majini waje sikiliza Qur'ani. Walipo hudhiria ilipo kuwa ikisomwa, baadhi yao wakawaambia wenzao: Sikilizeni! Ilipo kwisha timia kusomwa wakarudi kwa haraka kwa wenzao, kuwahadharisha na ukafiri, wakiwataka waamini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idh ṣarafnā ilayka nafaran mina al-jini yastamiʿūna al-qur'āna falammā ḥaḍarūhu qālū anṣitū falammā quḍiya wallaw ilā qawmihim mundhirīna
